content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the fraction with numerator sine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator, negative cosine x, minus sine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, cosine x, minus sine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, sine x, minus cosine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, cosine x, plus sine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator, cosine x, minus sine x, and denominator e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
